error.title: Error page!

http.403: You are not authorized to access this page.
http.405: The HTTP verb you used is not supported for this URL.

error.concurrencyFailure: Another user modified this data at the same time as you. Your changes were rejected.
error.initialsExists: A document type already exists with those initials.
error.documentNameExists: A document type already exists with those name.
error.DocumentTypeAndDocumentNumberExists: A customer with the same type and document number already exists.
error.DocumentNumberExists: There is already a customer with the same document number.
